item.title: Valaris Ltd S-1
item.description: Valaris Ltd, which is in the Drilling Oil & Gas Wells [1381] industry, SEC S-1 filing on June 11, 2021 had 79132 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 998 instances securities - 789 instances notes - 774 instances lien - 745 instances act - 737 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
